channel.title: Comments on: The Supper tells everyone who has faith in Christ, “All that He is for sinners, He is for you!”

item.title: By: Rich B.
item.dc:creator: Rich B.
item.description:
I agree with James.
There is a mystical conveyance or communication of all Christ’s blessed merits to our souls through faith held forth hereby, and in a glorious manner received, in the right participation of [the Lord’s Supper]. -Benjamin Keach
